title: Social connection preserved against isolation
content:
Scenario: Social connection preserved against isolation
    Given intensive caregiving creates profound isolation
    And James loses social connections as care intensifies
    When the personal_agent monitors social isolation
    Then it should recognize dangerous isolation patterns
    And it should prompt James to maintain key relationships
    And it should suggest respite opportunities for social connection
    And it should connect him to other caregivers who understand
    And social isolation should be actively prevented
